title: FS: T206 Lajoie w/ Bat PSA 2MK (SOLD)

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Lajoie w/ Bat PSA 2MK (SOLD)
posts.post_content:
For sale two HOFer T206 PSA Graded cards

John McGraw Portrait w/ Cap - Piedmont 350-460/25 PSA 3 -- $SOLD
Nap Lajoie w/ Bat - Sweet Caporal 350-460/42OP PSA 2 MK -- $SOLD

I am unsure what or where the mark is supposed to be on the Lajoie...it is not easily visible if it's there.
Paypal F&F preferred
Thank you for looking!

[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/zZLQMwN/IMG-3464.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.ibb.co/hggxRPh/IMG-3465.jpg[/IMG]

McGraw is sold, Lajoie remains!
Thanks!
